website_summaries.verdict: Choose these KEENs if you spend time outdoors but don't want to spend too much on sporty, attractive shoes. They are about half the price of most pairs by the brand.
pros: Not only are these shoes built for walking and light trail hiking, but the slip-on design makes them very easy to wear
Many rave about how "cute" they look
cons: Sizes are inconsistent, as they fit some wearers too snugly and for others are too large
More arch support would be nice
Feel somewhat heavy on the foot

customer_reviews.title: I really like Keen shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like Keen shoes, and I thought these were really cute slip-ons, so I purchased in my usual size 9. However, these babies were at least 1/2 size too large, and flopped off my heels big time when I walked in them. Back they went.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Too Big in my normal size
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes. The first pair I ordered were way too big. Ordered another pair in a size smaller and they were still too big. Now I am trying a Size 51/2. I normally wear a size 7 in Keen shoes. I really hope the 51/2 fits. I really love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic casual shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wanted something more casual. I have issues with my feet hurting after being on them a lot. No pain with these and I was able to wear them all day! Keen shoes have been so good for my feet. I've had 6 pairs of different styles. Only one was a disappointment. Looking forward to wearing these all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kristin Bercel

customer_reviews.title: wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: I have a wider toe box and a narrow heel. This shoe fits my toe box really well but the heel is way too wide. My heel kept slipping out, but I haven't found another slip-on canvas shoe to fit my toe box, so I kept them and bought some heel pads. They have helped. I like the Keens because I can take out the insole and put in my own. With the new insole and the heel pads, they are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Not for a narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes that come with a removable bed liner that is pretty beefy and has nice arch support (but not overly high). I wear an 8.5 and purchased an 8.5 medium. I do have a narrow foot, but can usually get away with wearing a medium, but I step right out of these shoes. I love the look of these shoes and have had great success with other Keen shoes, but these are just too wide. Sadly, I am having to return these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Loberkirch

customer_reviews.title: Zero drop! Nice wide toe box!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide toe box and the zero drop. I have bunions and arthritis in my toes; these place mo pressure at all on my toes (zero drop), and the wide toe box takes it easy on bunions. I normally take a 10 or 11, just depending on the shoe. These I ordered in 10.5, which is very hard to find in most shoes. They have a solid sole so fine for walking on most any surface, including gravel. Love them and have them now in two colors.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkyFine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Spring casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love KEEN’s, and the Elsa slip on is my most recent purchase. Part of what I like is the roomy toe box (my feet are about as wide as they can be without actually qualifying for a ‘wide’ shoe). These were super comfy from the first moment I put them on. They are really cute, and look especially good with ankle pants or capris. My SIL noticed them right away and is threatening to steal them!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, takes some time to break in, otherwise comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these are def not hiking shoes. They're similar to slip on Vans but with better quality and support. I am usually a ten and ordered a 9.5 based on reviews. My feet are about a half size different and my smaller foot was definitely slipping around and I got a pretty big blister on my heel the first day. I wasn't wearing socks. I don't think I could have gone any smaller since my larger foot was fit perfectly. I'm planning to get a heel insert.
customer_reviews.author: IveGotSomethingToSay

customer_reviews.title: Flatter arch support
customer_reviews.text: I found the size to be fine for overall fit (7). I can feel where they may slip off the heel but these seem fine without socks. The arch support is more flat than the other Keens I own. They would need more arch support for me to wear hiking. I bought them to slip on to walk to the store/post office/short trips. So far so good. Have not walked more than a mile in them yet. Most of my shoes are Keen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keen's Win Again!
customer_reviews.text: I love Keen shoes and these did not disappoint! They are exactly what I wanted. They have a bit of arch support, but not quite enough for me, so I just pulled out the insoles and slipped in some Superfeet insoles. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mkktoday

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Fall Slip-ON
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Elsa Slip-on Hiking Shoes for 1 week. They are still in the breaking in stage. The fit is as I expected,I ordered my regular size 71/2. The only problem I've encountered is a blister on my right heel because the right back is digging in or bend in just a bit. I've stuck on a spot dot cushion and am giving that a try. I love the look for an everyday slip on with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Moore

customer_reviews.title: size ran small
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear an 8 or 8 1/2 so i ordered these in an 8 1/2 ... my toes were touching the tips of the shoe so i shipped back and ordered the 9 ... they fit perfect ... i ordered a second pair in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Bubblelicious

customer_reviews.title: Love my slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and have great support. I like them so well I purchased another pair in a different color. I wish that Keen would bring this specific style back. Very well made
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Keens with the added convenience of slip ons!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Love all my Keens. I live in California where they tell you to have sturdy shoes by your bed in case of an earthquake. I have these nearby because they are definitely sturdy; I know my feet will be protected, and they're slip on, so it's a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Love this sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and surprisingly supportive for a flat canvas shoe. You can remove the wonderful insoles and machine wash them, lay flat to dry (it gets rid if any foot smell from wearing without socks)I love them and would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Leviathan

customer_reviews.title: My size would be 9 3/4
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe, and if It fit, I would be delighted. The 10 was too large, and the 9.5 uncomfortably tight. I'd like to try the 10 again, but Keen might think me nuts. We'll see, I do like the shoe,
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Baird

customer_reviews.title: Way too large
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 in all other shoes, but this was way too large. There was no way my heel was staying in this shoe. I would probably try a 9, but decided to just return them for now.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN

customer_reviews.title: What I like the most is Keen quality
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is Keen quality. Love the dark Navy, crisp with the white trim. Little snug than expected but have been wearing open sandals, so adjustment period is expected. The brindle color turned out to be more olive than khaki color, bit will keep, also.
customer_reviews.author: Exploring

customer_reviews.title: Like the look, but not a good fit for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I think these shoes are very cute especially the white ridged toe part. I tried them in an 8 and they were too small. I tried an 8.5, but they slipped off my heel. I love Keens and have several pairs, but these were not a good fit for me. I ended up getting their lace up (Converse style) shoes and like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are made for walking
customer_reviews.text: My favorite go to pair of shoes. Feels so comfortable. Little heavy but I don’t kind.
customer_reviews.author: K. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe with support
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I read the reviews and decided to go ahead and order my regular size which is 9 and they fit perfectly. Usually this style of she does not provide any support but these certainly do. I have worn Keen shoes before and will certainly come back to them. I know I will roder another pair of these...maybe more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: best comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these in our local mall in beige at a much higher price.I loved them so much, they are lovely and wide for my funny small toe that can get sore with lots of other shoes. if I can get them in Navy also at this price I will do.
customer_reviews.author: anne Brook

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is super cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe. Keen Shoes are always of excellent quality and the arch support is phenomenal. The first time I wore these I got compliments. I’m thinking about going back for another color.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Too Narrow....
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these Keen's. They were not wide enough for my foot "knuckles" to feel comfortable. They were nicely cushioned and put a bounce in my step.
customer_reviews.author: YzWm

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and fit well for day to day activity. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Newman

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are great even though I can"t wear them
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are great even though I can"t wear them. I love Keen shoes and I really loved these but they are slip on and I have real skinny feet so they wouldn't stay on my feet. my daughter loves them now.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed: I was looking for a light fabric shoe wiht support. Instead, it is heavy, rigid and has no arch support. Unlike the Keen I know...
customer_reviews.author: AdnasK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So comfortable and go well with a casual dress, shorts, or pants. Great walking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Dee S. Sprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Where footies!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, however they are a snug fit so wear footies with them! I made the mistake and wore them without and got blisters! I will keep them though because they will stretch out!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 8. 5 due to reviews saying they ran ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 8.5 due to reviews saying they ran large but they were too small so I returned them and ordered. Size 9 bu the toe base was too narrow, so I returned those as well and am still waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: icequeen

customer_reviews.title: One smaller than the other
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for support and cuteness, however, the right shoe was too small for me. These are the only shoes i have like this.
customer_reviews.author: Candice T.

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty wide, heavier than expected. Bought 1/2 size down due to other feedback. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, so many compliments, one of my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jjjjordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have become my most favorite. I wear them every.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size but I bought it because of Keen's famous "large toe box"....the shoe wasn't quite as wide as I needed. The support was good, just too tight across the top/front of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I love the fit. They are comfortable and cute. I can wear them all day at work where I am on my feet and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elise C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly narrow
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be wide just like most keens are, but these are surprisingly narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene R.

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I have been a Keen fan for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Elsa Keens. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I have been a Keen fan for a long time and the products have never disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Alsatia T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this shoe! Durable and well made. My last pair lasted me three years!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable after it was broken in
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable after it was broken in. The back dug into my heel, but softened up with wear. It's fine for now, but unlikely to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tomamo

customer_reviews.title: They are super cute.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected size wise, however they are a little roomy. I think I will need to wear thicker socks with them. They are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: KAV

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These fit the same as my other keens. Very comfortable out of the box. The back is a little stiff, but after a couple days they have broken in nicely. I've even gotten a few compliments.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slip-on kick about shoe and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: toni wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great, comfortable shoe. I mean, it's KEEN! Just what you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love theses shoes...they are as expected...Keen shoes are my go to shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keen shoes are best. Amazing again has excellent service, delivery. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confort, support and look great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit me so well. I struggle with all boat shoe styles since almost all of them dig into the top of my foot. These do not dig in at all and are very supportive. They also look great on.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little short on me, but I liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, good support, but just a tad too short for me in a size 11. So my daughter is enjoying this pair of casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great summer shoe to hang outside in. Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the look but shoes are not as wide as all my other keen shoes
customer_reviews.author: DO Lists

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoes without laces - Yay!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect tennis shoe --- no laces!! Very comfortable and great for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Jovita Garcia-Duer

customer_reviews.title: Love them but a little big!
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. I bought the size 10 which I usually wear in Keens. I wear cotton socks that are realitively heavy. The heels were slipping and I got blisters. I kept wearing them and built up caluses in my heels. If I wear light socks the shoes are too big!
customer_reviews.author: Keko

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: I did return this shoe only because I needed one size larger
customer_reviews.author: louie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for an easy slip on
customer_reviews.text: cute! Just what I wanted for an easy slip on, summer, shoe:-)
customer_reviews.author: Staci L Dorr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Are not as comfortable as other Keen shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B. Spurry

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are so comfortable and a great fit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Twila

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe but to narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoe but to narrow for me. I have a wide foot. I would for sure buy them if they made them in a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Fetters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. I am a true 37, 7B and it fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: jeje

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Go to slip on sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, convenient and comfy. Get lots of compliments and inquiries as to where people can buy these shoes. I bought navy and black.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Reiche

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Keen shoes, these slipped off my feet even though I ordered my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Filleul

customer_reviews.title: Too Big !
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get an exchange but I was two days past the cut off day. I tried to call and see if I could just exchange them to a 10 but they said I could not. I can't wear them. To big!
customer_reviews.author: janine scharf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Keen's and love these.... very comfortable and feel great
customer_reviews.author: Happybeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these Keens!! A little snug across the bridge of foot but they break in quickly! Great comfort!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very comfortable and really cute. I have issues with my feet hurting after a while but I haven't had an issue in these
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The were even better than I expected! Fit perfectly, cost less than Duluth or LLBean, and were delivered quickly!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, fine quality shoe but runs wide.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The keen style is a little big looking around the toe, but very comfortable sole. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Valerie

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked the way Keens fit
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the way Keens fit, I have a wide foot, I wear a size 10, that's what I ordered and they fit perfectly. Arrived quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Suszanne

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, not as high of arch as my last pair of Keens. Could use higher arch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. No arch support and toe area to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. No arch support and toe area to firm. Usually Keen shoes work for me but not this style. They are very cute however
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Keen shoes are great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Keen shoes...they fit great and so comfy
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sooo cute very comfortable, very happy, I'm size 5 perfect fit, keen is the best
customer_reviews.author: jedra 374

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Keen shoes and have several pair so I was excited to see this slip on. They're really comfortable and I've already had lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: HEvans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and provide good support for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted these to fit since they are adorable but they were huge.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle shopper

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is very attractive and well made. My ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very attractive and well made. My only issue with it is the heel is quite wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wide toe box but not the keen support I love in my hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Lund

customer_reviews.title: Loving them!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected.. Will be ordering more colors! Do wish the white at the front was not so big, maybe could be color-coded to the color of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Albea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and easy to slip on and off. Great if you like a little more room for toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Keen's and these are no exceptions
customer_reviews.text: I love Keen's and these are no exceptions. I strongly recommend. They look great with jeans, capri's and other casual clothing.
customer_reviews.author: NINA NELSON

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: Bought because of other reviewers recommending for bunions. I like them. Nice and roomy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much. I have worn out a pair of Keen slip ons that I bought years ago, so I was happy to see this similar style. Some people mentioned they run narrow, but I ordered a 9 1/2 and it's perfect and my foot runs wide. I wish they had gray, but this khaki is a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Eulalie

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs small. I love the style, so I have reordered in a next larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Soi P.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit to size as sometimes keens run small. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H. Gervasi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The right show is way looser than the left- pretty irritating. Right size foot-length wise.
customer_reviews.author: sara savana

customer_reviews.title: are extremely comfortable, have many sifferent options for styles
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pairs of Keens over the years and they all fit a bit differently. I have learned sizing and know when to get the 7 and when to get the 7.5. The slip-on shoe is typically a 7 and the hiking shoe/boot is the 7.5. They last, are extremely comfortable, have many sifferent options for styles, including sandals (Uneek is one of the best, most versatile, comfortable sandals I have owned). Keen is my goto shoe for just about everything. Currently have about 9 different styles in my closet. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. they are very comfortable. Also made well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Poore

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfortable. These are feminine but still sporty and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ooooooohhh!! These are so cute! SUPER comfortable. These are feminine but still sporty and they're perfect with a pair of capris or leggings and a tshirt. I love them! I just got them and I don't want to take them off!! I've never had KEEN shoes before but I think I may have to look into other styles, too! Totally worth the cost and they arrived super fast. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so super comfortable I will be wearing them all the time. I have such trouble with my feet and it is hard to find comfortable shoes, but I can walk/stand in these all day and my feet don't hurt. They are wide, which is good for me. I usually order an 8 or 8.5, and these were perfect in the 8.
customer_reviews.author: Klister

customer_reviews.title: These just seem really stiff and I'm not sure they'll ever be as as comfortable as other Keens that I have worn
customer_reviews.text: 3-1/2 Stars ... These just seem really stiff and I'm not sure they'll ever be as as comfortable as other Keens that I have worn. I like the style but they just haven't broken in yet and I've worn them continually for a few weeks. Otherwise I would've given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good for lots of walking, great tread
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually wear slip-on sneakers, but these were a great buy. They don't rub the back of my feet or slip off, and the foot bed is cushy with good arch support. I loved my last pear of Keen sneakers, but what I like better about these is that they have good tread on the bottom so that I'm not slipping and sliding when it rains. I recommend wearing them with low-cut socks/peds
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and fabric
customer_reviews.text: You have changed the style and fabric from past slip ons I have purchased by keen. Current shoes are clunky and hot. Any way to get the ones you carried before?
customer_reviews.author: catherine coman

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, just a little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love Keen shoes. This particular pair is a bit narrower than most other Keens, and I'm hoping that they break in with a little more wear.
customer_reviews.author: DaCol

customer_reviews.title: Great show -- might need to order down 1/2 size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Usually wear a 9 in keen shoes, but the heel was a bit large and caused the shoe to flop off and rub. The 8.5 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Girl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but somewhat small. Not as instantly comfy as the Elsa boots but I think they will get more comfortable as they break in.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kozowski

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got these in my normal size 7 and they fit beautifully. I love the color Brindle, it’s a shade of olive and actually as I had hoped it’s a very neutral color. I purchased the 7 in the Keen lace ups and the shoe was so stiff I couldn’t even get my foot in it. It was as if they sprayed them with a ridiculous amount of starch. I had bunionectomies (both feet) last year and even tho I still consider myself a wide width these slip ons are so well fitting it’s as if they were made especially for me. I’m so happy and would definitely refer them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

product_meta.title: KEEN Women's ELSA SLIP-ON Sneaker
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
